Uses of Package
space.serialization

  • Packages that use space.serialization 
    Package Description
    space.network  
    space.serialization  
  • Classes in space.serialization used by space.network 
    Class and Description
    SaveFileNotAccessibleException
    A exception class that extends exception - indicates that the json save file specified does not exist in that location
    SaveFileNotValidException
    A exception class that is thrown when the save file is not valid or formatted correctly
    WorldLoader
    This interface specifies how the server and client will load the world.
    WorldSaver
    This interface specifies how the server will save the world.
  • Classes in space.serialization used by space.serialization 
    Class and Description
    MyJsonList
    Represents a MyJsonList for classes and entities in the game this is a wrapper class for the raw JSONArray from the library It enables type safety rather than being generic - to avoid accidently put the wrong data type
    MyJsonObject
    Represents a MyJsonObject for classes and entities in the game this is a wrapper class for the raw JSONObject from the library It enables type safety rather than just being generic - to avoid accidently put the wrong data type
    SaveFileNotAccessibleException
    A exception class that extends exception - indicates that the json save file specified does not exist in that location
    SaveFileNotValidException
    A exception class that is thrown when the save file is not valid or formatted correctly
    WorldLoader
    This interface specifies how the server and client will load the world.
    WorldSaver
    This interface specifies how the server will save the world.
